languages.text: Благородный Космический волк Ульфар не смог охранить Вольного Торговца от темного искушения поклониться древнему звездному божеству. Темное пророчество Доппельгренделя исполнилось наполовину — пусть Ульфару и выпало умереть в безвестности, но смерть его от рук древнего чудовища была поистине славна и достойна.
languages.translation_comment: Ульфар был в пати и игрок присягнул Ктану

languages.text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophecy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monster was truly honourable and glorious.
languages.original_text: Благородный Космический волк Ульфар не смог охранить Вольного Торговца от темного искушения поклониться древнему звездному божеству. Темное пророчество Доппельгренделя исполнилось наполовину — пусть Ульфару и выпало умереть в безвестности, но смерть его от рук древнего чудовища была поистине славна и достойна.

traits.locale_text: Noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not guard the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophesy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his death in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monstrosity was truly honourable and full of glory.

Noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not guard the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophesy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his death in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monstrosity was truly honourable and full of glory.

The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophesy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient fiend was truly honourable and glorious.

The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophesy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient fiend was truly honourable and glorious.

The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophecy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monster was truly honourable and glorious.

The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophecy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monster was truly honourable and glorious.

languages.text: 高贵的太空野狼乌尔法没能保护行商浪人免受远古星神的黑暗诱惑，最终在那头远古怪物手中光荣战死。黑暗化身的预言实现了一半，尽管乌尔法默默无闻地死去，但他的死法却充满了荣耀。
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophecy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monster was truly honourable and glorious.

traits.locale_text: 高贵的太空野狼乌尔法没能保护行商浪人免受远古星神的黑暗诱惑，最终在那头远古怪物手中光荣战死。黑暗化身的预言实现了一半，尽管乌尔法默默无闻地死去，但他的死法却充满了荣耀。

languages.text: Der edle Space Wolf Ulfar konnte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht vor der dunklen Versuchung beschützen, einen uralten Sternengott anzubeten. Die Prophezeiung der dunklen Doppelgrendel wurde zur Hälfte erfüllt: Ulfar fand sein Ende zwar unbemerkt, doch sein Tod durch die Hände des uralten Monsters war in der Tat ehrenvoll und glorreich.
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophecy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monster was truly honourable and glorious.

traits.locale_text: Der edle Space Wolf Ulfar konnte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht vor der dunklen Versuchung beschützen, einen uralten Sternengott anzubeten. Die Prophezeiung der dunklen Doppelgrendel wurde zur Hälfte erfüllt: Ulfar fand sein Ende zwar unbemerkt, doch sein Tod durch die Hände des uralten Schurken war in der Tat ehrenvoll und glorreich.

languages.text: Le noble Space Wolf Ulfar fut incapable d'empêcher {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de vénérer un Dieu Stellaire ancien. La prophétie du doppelgrendel était à moitié accomplie : Ulfar perdit la vie dans l'obscurité, mais sa mort aux mains de l'ancien monstre fut honorable et glorieuse.
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophecy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monster was truly honourable and glorious.

traits.locale_text: Le noble Space Wolf Ulfar fut incapable d'empêcher {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de vénérer un Dieu Stellaire ancien. La prophétie du doppelgrendel était à moitié accomplie : Ulfar perdit la vie dans l'obscurité, mais sa mort aux mains de l’abomination fut honorable et glorieuse.

languages.text: El noble Lobo Espacial Ulfar no pudo proteger a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de la tentación de adorar a un dios estelar ancestral. La profecía del siniestro Doppelgrendel se cumplió a medias: aunque Ulfar murió sin que nadie lo supiera, sus últimos momentos frente al monstruo inmemorial fueron verdaderamente honorables y gloriosos.
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophecy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monster was truly honourable and glorious.

traits.locale_text: El noble Lobo Espacial Ulfar no pudo proteger a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de la tentación de adorar a un dios estelar ancestral. La profecía del siniestro Doppelgrendel se cumplió a medias: aunque Ulfar murió sin que nadie lo supiera, sus últimos momentos frente a la criatura inmemorial fueron verdaderamente honorables y gloriosos.

languages.text: 高貴なスペースウルフであるウルファーは、古代の星々の神を崇拝するという暗い誘惑から自由開拓者を守ることができなかった。闇のドッペルグレンデルの予言は半分が果たされた。ウルファーは名を上げぬまま最期を迎えたが、古の怪物の手によって与えられた死は、真に名誉ある輝かしいものだった。
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophecy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monster was truly honourable and glorious.

traits.locale_text: 高貴なスペースウルフであるウルファーは、古代の星々の神を崇拝するという暗い誘惑から自由開拓者を守ることができなかった。闇のドッペルグレンデルの予言は半分が果たされた。ウルファーは名を上げぬまま最期を迎えたが、古の怪物の手によって与えられた死は、真に名誉ある輝かしいものだった。

languages.text: Asil Uzay Kurdu Ulfar, Hür Tacir'i kadim Yıldız Tanrı'ya tapınma isteğine karşı koruyamadı. Kara Suretçalan'ın kehaneti, yarı yarıya gerçekleşmiş oldu: Ulfar'ın nasıl öldüğü kulaktan kulağa yayılıp efsanelere konu olmasa da kadim canavarın ellerindeki ölümü, gerçekten de onurlu ve görkemliydi.
languages.original_text: The noble Space Wolf Ulfar could not protect the Rogue Trader from the dark temptation of worshipping an ancient Star God. The dark Doppelgrendel's prophecy was half-fulfilled: though Ulfar met his end in obscurity, his death at the hands of the ancient monster was truly honourable and glorious.

traits.locale_text: Asil Uzay Kurdu Ulfar, Hür Tacir'i kadim Yıldız Tanrı'ya tapınma isteğine karşı koruyamadı. Karanlık Suretçalan'ın kehâneti yarı yarıya gerçekleşmişti: Ulfar'ın nasıl öldüğü kulaktan kulağa yayılıp efsanelere konu olmadı belki ancak kadim canavarın ellerindeki ölümü gerçekten de onurlu ve görkemliydi.

languages.translation_comment: Ульфар был в пати и игрок присягнул Ктану
